description:
Eiji Kitahama joins the drama club with dreams of having a harem like the ones from his favorite manga. Rin Nanakura, an underclassman, finds herself crushing hard on Eiji and tries on different personas in his presence to win him over. No matter how she acts, one thing is certain—her feelings for Eiji continue to grow stronger. Will she ever be able to tell him the truth and be herself?

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: ฮาเร็มนี้มีแต่เธอ

tags.name: Acting
tags.description: Centers around actors or the acting industry.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Marriage
tags.description: Centers around marriage between two or more characters.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: College
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a college or university.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

[Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/wonderlandclara) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/wonderlandclara) | [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/@wonderlandclara)

Clara Campos is a Brazilian actress, voice actress, singer, translator, reviewer, cosplayer, and idol.

[Instagram](https://Instagram.com/conradogalluccisotero/) | [Facebook](https://facebook.com/conrado.galluccisotero)

Conrado Gallucci Sotero is a Brazilian actor, voice actor and dubbing director.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/marcos_padro) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/marcospadro/)

An Argentine audio engineer and ADR director.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/81073758) | [Instagram](https://www.facebook.com/deresuke2012)

Hiroyuki Yamada is the founder and representative director of Takuranke (たくらんけ) - not to be confused to Studio Takuranke (スタジオたくらんけ) which went bankrupt in 2023 though he had also worked for that studio previously.
